1.title: Gamer Rate: Dragon Power
1.plot: GAMER RATE is a show in which we review and assess classic and contemporary gaming, with some random finds as well. Here our host RALPH MOFFETTONE meets with bonafide gamer and game aficionado DAN McCLAIN to play and discuss the Super Nintendo oddity DRAGON POWER.

2.title: Gamer Rate: Soul Blade
2.plot: GAMER RATE is a show in which we review and assess classic and contemporary gaming, with some random finds as well. Here our host RALPH MOFFETTONE plays and discusses the PlayStaion 1 classic SOUL BLADE.

3.title: Gamer Rate: Unofficial Nintendo Special
3.plot: GAMER RATE is a show in which we review and assess classic and contemporary gaming, with some random finds as well. On this very special episode, our host RALPH MOFFETTONE celebrates all things Nintendo, and by way of that, all things video games. It's the UNOFFICIAL NINTENDO SPECIAL!

imdb.plot outline: Ralph Moffettone hosts GAMER RATE, "the show in which we review and asses classic and contemporary gaming, with some random finds as well." Under the guise of reviewing an often little-known video game, Ralph repeatedly attempts to make friends, fit in, confront members of his family, and convince himself he is a "bonafide gamer and game aficionado."
imdb.title: Gamer Rate
plot: Satirical video game review show following a disturbed young man as he meets with gamers and members of his family to ostensibly talk gaming.

Ralph Moffettone hosts GAMER RATE, "the show in which we review and asses classic and contemporary gaming, with some random finds as well." Under the guise of reviewing an often little-known video game, Ralph repeatedly attempts to make friends, fit in, confront members of his family, and convince himself he is a "bonafide gamer and game aficionado."
